plot: Mario does not want to tell his family what a bad time he's having in a foreign country.
title: Hola mamá, qué onda por allí
plot_es: Mario does not want to tell his family what a bad time he's having in a foreign country.
original_name: Hola mamá, qué onda por allí
plot_en: Mario does not want to tell his family what a bad time he's having in a foreign country.
